availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Simon Lycurgus Morgan (Allen County, Kentucky, farmer and Justice of the Peace)

body.p: Allen County, Kentucky, farmer and Justice of the Peace. Virginia native. Married to Ann C. Williams Morgan. Father of James W. Morgan, Samuel H. Morgan, Francis M. Morgan, Mary E. Morgan, Lycurgus J. Morgan, John B. Morgan, William F. Morgan, Robert W. Morgan, and Jane B. Morgan. Farmer in Logan County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Allen County, Kentucky, in 1860. Justice of the Peace in Allen County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 21A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Scottsville, p. 370.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Allen County Wills, vol. D-E, 1825-1902.
KYR-0001-029-0118
Texas Death Certificates, 1903-1982, Texas Department of State Health Services, Austin, TX.
